short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamless simplification according to age. Other features including a solve button, dictionary, translator.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This web extension utilizes revolutionary Artificial Intelligence to parse text requested from an API to make life easier for the user. 

Solve Button: "Solves" a highlighted problem and explains the reasoning behind the solving.
Dictionary: "Defines" a highlighted word/phrase 
Simplify: "Simplifies" a highlighted text to the highlighted age.
Translate: "Translates" a highlighted phrase to a pre-saved language.
